metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32840 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: SharpZipLib (or #ziplib) is a Zip, GZip, Tar and BZip2 library. Prior to version 1.3.3, a TAR file entry `../evil.txt` may be extracted in the parent directory of `destFolder`. This leads to arbitrary file write that may lead to code execution. The vulnerability was patched in version 1.3.3.

criterions.comment: mono: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
